inlineView.webviewers.name: Containers
inlineView.webviewers.hint: Add like ⋘ [https://foundryvtt.com/api/, Foundry API, fas fa-code], [https://foundryvtt.com, Foundry], [https://dndbeyond.com, DnDBeyond, none, true] ⋙ Font Awesome icons are optional, "none" sets it to default icon. 4th argument is compatibility mode, only use when normal mode doesn't work for the site.
inlineView.useJournal.name: Use journal
inlineView.useJournal.hint: Use a journal named "Containers" instead of the "Containers" setting.
inlineView.webviewColor.name: Background color
inlineView.webviewColor.hint: Changes the color of the webview background
inlineView.webviewColor.label: Choose Color
inlineView.notifications.settingsError: Something is wrong with the webview settings. Check your formatting.
